title: Ignite Inferno CNC’d road cranks light up new road, gravel & MTB cranks
content:
The fully CNC’d alloy cranksets from Ignite have come a long way since we first saw prototypes in March this year. The design is far sleeker, and they’ve just introduced a narrower road and gravel bike version to join the MTB model first shown. With rounded edges and some wild-looking new finish options, not to

The post Ignite Inferno CNC’d road cranks light up new road, gravel & MTB cranks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
